section.title: Configuration Files
section.para:
There are two configuration files to worry about:
login.xml is used for the login server
channel.xml is used for the channel server

Note that these files can have a different name. By default, the server will search for this configuration file in the following location:
Windows - the file login.xml or channel.xml (depending on which server) in the current working directory
Linux - the login.xml or channel.xml (depending on which server) in /etc/comp_hack
